synopsis.text: The protagonist, Eiichirou Maruo, has set his sights on becoming a professional tennis player and convinces his parents to support his ambition by wagering his dream on winning the All-Japan Junior Tennis Tournament. To enhance his skills and qualify for the tournament, his coach, Ryuuhei Aoi, sends him to the Florida Tennis Academy for a two-week training program. As Eiichirou experiences tennis on an international level for the first time, he faces rivals from around the world, pushing him to recognize his weaknesses and grow both as a player and an individual. This season follows Eiichirou's journey abroad, showcasing his development and determination to achieve his ultimate goal. Witness Eiichirou's transformation from an inexperienced, honor student to a dedicated and strategic tennis player, using his intelligence and strong work ethic to make his dream a reality.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
